translation: 很多莫哈维的人认为大裂谷除了峡谷和风暴之外什么都没有。并不总是如此。

original: There was life, a town, farther West... not talking about an Old World town like Hopeville... more recent. Something you saw in your lifetime.
translation: 那里曾有生活，有城镇，更远的西部...不是说像黎明镇这样的小镇...更近。是你在有生之年看到的东西。

original: It had the name "the Divide," too. But rather than cracks in the earth, it was a road from the West into the Mojave, a supply line.
translation: 它也有一个名字叫“大裂谷”。但它不是大地的裂缝，而是一条从西部进入莫哈维的道路，一条补给线。

original: Took a Courier to make that road. You. Back then, you saw the road with eyes facing East. This time... the Divide's in the other direction.
translation: 开辟那条路需要一名邮差，你。那时，你是朝东看向这条路的。这一次...大裂谷在另一个方向。

original: And if your eyes try to make sense of it when you reach it... home's not what it was.
translation: 如果当你到达的时候眼睛试图理解它...家已经不再是过去的样子了。

original: You're not taking ED-E from me.
translation: 你休想从我这儿带走ED-E。

original: If you think you can take it from me, try.
translation: 如果你觉得你能从我这里夺走，那就试试。

original: The machine you brought is mine now, it's coming home. I'll reduce it to parts, just enough to function, to be aware of what's happening.
translation: 你带来的机器现在是我的了，它要回家了。我会把它拆解成几个部分，刚好可以运行，以便了解发生了什么。

original: ED-E's not going anywhere.
translation: ED-E哪儿也不去。

original: What? ED-E?
translation: 什么？ED-E？

original: You gave it a name. What was it to you? Companion? Slave... weapon? All of that, nothing compared to its primary function.
translation: 你给了它一个名字，它对你来说是什么？同伴？奴隶...武器？所有这些与它的主要功能相比都不算什么。

original: If you bomb the West and East... is this how things should end?
translation: 如果你轰炸西部和东部...事情应该就这样结束？

original: [SUCCEEDED] History has proven this. Our history.
translation: [成功 历史已经证明过这一点了。我们的历史。

original: You seek to use your own crimes to prevent mine. There... is a strange honor in that. Perhaps the shadow of the Bull does walk with you.
translation: 你试图用你的罪行来阻止我的。这...是一种奇怪的荣誉，也许公牛的影子确实与你同行。

original: The West, the East - they are not the Divide, and nothing you can do can prevent the missile's launch. Convincing me - changes nothing.
translation: 西部，东部 - 它们不是大裂谷，你做什么都无法阻止导弹的发射。说服我 - 改变不了什么。

original: There is no honor in murder from a distance, NCR or Legion. You know this from the Divide.
translation: 从远处谋杀没有荣誉可言，无论是NCR还是军团。你从大裂谷就知道了这一点。

original: [FAILED] You answer me with questions. Doubt. You were strong enough to come here - but not strong enough to speak for all the Legion.
translation: [失败] 你用问题来回答我。不确定。你有足够的力量来到这里 - 但还没有强大到可以代表军团发声。

original: This is the ending they deserve... a flag is a thing of the people that gather to it, as are all symbols.
translation: 这是他们应得的结局...旗帜是人们聚集在一起的产物，正如所有的象征一样。

original: You believe. Yet you do not see that killing a symbol with its own weapon carries justice of its own... just as it will when the East dies as well.
translation: 你相信。但你没有看到用自己的武器来杀死一个象征本身就是一种正义...就像东部灭亡时那样。

original: Vegas earned its right to survive, its people don't deserve what's about to happen.
translation: 维加斯赢得了生存的权利，它的人民不应该遭受即将发生的一切。

original: [SUCCEEDED] History has proven this. Our history.
translation: [成功 历史已经证明过这一点了。我们的历史。

original: And you think that you have this strength? Enough to hold up NCR, long enough so that Vegas may live again?
translation: 你觉得你有这种力量吗？足以支撑起NCR足够长的时间，让维加斯重获生机吗？

original: Even if you speak for Vegas and its ghosts, nothing you can do can prevent the missile's launch. Convincing me - changes nothing.
translation: 即使你替维加斯和它的幽灵说话，你也无法阻止导弹的发射。说服我 - 改变不了什么。

original: You told me once I gave life to the Divide. I can do it again, and give life to Vegas.
translation: 你曾经告诉我，我赋予了大裂谷生命。我可以再来一次，给维加斯生命。

original: [FAILED] No... your answer is not enough.
translation: [失败]不...你的答案还不够。

original: They deserve what comes. Vegas is born of the corrupt, the  blind, lost, that gather to it. Without them... it would fall dark.
translation: 这是他们应得的。维加斯是由堕落、盲目、迷失的人组成的...没有他们，它将陷入黑暗。

original: You believe. Yet... you have been blinded by the wrong symbol. Let its light give you what strength it can... today marks its end.
translation: 你相信。然而...你被错误的象征蒙蔽了双眼。让它的灯光给你它所能给予的力量，今天标志着它的终结。

original: There still might be a way out of this - I just need time.
translation: 也许还有办法...我只是需要时间。

original: We've already handled everything it can throw at us.
translation: 我们已经处理了所有可能的问题。

original: The Divide? What do you mean?
translation: 大裂谷？你是什么意思？

original: Our enemies gather outside... shadows of the Bear and Bull... they will have found their way in, just as you did.
translation: 我们的敌人聚集在外面...熊和公牛的影子...他们会找到进入的方法，就像你那样。

original: It was always my intention - in case I could not kill you, the Marked Men would flood this place, cut off your escape.
translation: 这一直是我的计划 - 万一我杀不了你，烙印者也会淹没这个地方，切断你的退路。

original: If we cannot prevent what comes, then let us make our stand here. Two Couriers, together, at the Divide.
translation: 如果我们不能阻止将要发生的事，那就让我们站在这里。两个邮差，一起，在大裂谷。

original: Even if the missiles launch, and I die here  - if I can convince you, that's enough for me.
translation: 即使导弹发射，我死在这里，如果我能说服你，那对我来说就足够了。

original: It is... enough.
translation: 这...够了。

original: I believe that one person can make... or break... a nation. You already know this.
translation: 我相信，一个人可以创造...或毁灭...一个国家。 你已经知道这一点了。

original: It may be... that as much destruction has been written in the earth here... you may build something else, as you built the Divide.
translation: 可能是...这里的大地已经写下了如此多的毁灭...你可以建立别的，就像你建立大裂谷那样。

original: You have spoken truly. There is a shadow of a nation behind you, the hope of a people... yet it may not matter. The Divide still stands against us.
translation: 你说得很对。你身后有一个国家的影子，一个民族的希望...然而这可能无关紧要，大裂谷仍然与我们对立。

original: Well, I just said all that because I'm betting you have some way to stop all this.
translation: 我之所以这么说，是因为我相信你有办法阻止这一切。

original: So... you resort to trickery. You were hoping that you could deceive me, reveal that somehow I can stop all this.
translation: 所以...你诉诸于欺骗。你希望你能骗到我，揭示我有某种方法阻止这一切。

original: Fire will rain on the West and the East, as intended, and the last words of the messenger of the Bull - nothing but lies.
translation: 火雨会落向西部和东部，正如预期的那样。而公牛使者的最后一句话 - 除了谎言什么都没有。

original: The West will burn, as intended, and Vegas will follow. The last words of its messenger, were not for the people of the city, but lies and deceit.
translation: 西部将会如期燃烧，维加斯紧随其后。它的使者说的最后一句话，不是为了城里的人民，而是谎言和欺骗。

original: Your nation will burn, as intended, and the last words of its messenger, were not for its people, but to beg for mercy.
translation: 你的国家将如期燃烧，它的使者说的最后一句话，不是为了人民，而是乞求宽恕。

original: Because it should be given a chance? Its people don't deserve what's about to happen.
translation: 因为应该给它一个机会？它的人民不应该遭受即将发生的一切。

original: [SUCCEEDED] History has proven this. Our history.
translation: [成功] 历史已经证明了这一点。我们的历史。

original: And you think that you have this strength? Enough for all of NCR?
translation: 你认为有这样的实力吗？足以对抗所有的NCR？

original: The West is not the Divide, and nothing you can do can prevent the missile's launch. Convincing me - changes nothing.
translation: 西部不是大裂谷，你阻止不了导弹的发射.说服我-改变不了什么

original: One can build a community, make it stronger. You saw it at the Divide, even blamed me for it.
translation: 一个人可以建立一个社区，使其更加壮大。你在大裂谷看到了这一点，甚至为此指责我。

original: [FAILED] No... your answer is not enough.
translation: [失败]不...你的答案还不够。

original: They deserve what comes... and should answer for it, as you should. The Bear is a thing of the people that gather to it, as are all symbols.
translation: 这是他们应得的...也应该像你一样为此负责。熊是人们聚集在一起的产物，和所有的象征一样。

original: You believe. Yet... you believe in the wrong symbol. Let it give you what strength it can... soon, it will be no more.
translation: 你相信。然而...你相信的是错误的象征。让它给你它的力量吧...很快，它将不复存在。

original: Do you think I care if you fire missiles at NCR? Go ahead.
translation: 你以为我在乎你向NCR发射导弹吗？去做吧。

original: You destroyed your own homeland. Seeing a nation burn? Didn't think that would matter any more to you.
translation: 你摧毁了自己的家园。看到一个国家燃烧？我以为这对你来说已经不重要了。

original: There's a strength in that... lack of attachment. Still, you're here now. If there's no more answers you want, then we'll end this.
translation: 这里面有一种力量...缺乏信念。不过，你现在已经在这里了。如果你不想知道更多的答案，那我们就结束这一切。

original: You can't destroy the West, even with all the missiles here.
translation: 即使有那么多导弹，你也无法摧毁西部。

original: No need to destroy the Bear, just cut its throat.
translation: 不需要摧毁熊，只要割断它的喉咙。

original: You taught me that at the Divide - only need to cut off the supply line, the road, to watch something greater die.
translation: 你在大裂谷教会了我 - 只要切断补给线，切断道路，就能看到更大的东西死去。

original: I'll turn the Long 15 into miles of fire, cut off the Mojave. NCR will fall back, lose Hoover Dam... and leave their throats exposed to the Legion.
translation: 我会把15号洲际公路变成火海，切断莫哈维的通道。NCR会撤退，放弃胡佛大坝...把他们的咽喉暴露给军团。

original: And knowing that you believe in the Bear's sickness and have given it strength... then that gives more reason to lay waste to your homeland.
translation: 也知道你相信熊的疾病并赋予了它力量...那就更加有理由摧毁你的家园了。

original: The sickness of the Bear already lies within you, even if you uphold the East. If there were time, I would let you kill the Legion.
translation: 熊的疾病已经在你体内了，即使你拥护东部。假如果有时间，我会让你杀死军团。

original: But no, the Legion will burn as well. Without the West to challenge it... its shore will be closer than before. It will feed on itself, die.
translation: 但不，军团也会被烧毁。没有来自西部的挑战...它的海岸会比以前更近。它会以自己为食，然后死去。

original: Without NCR to support it, Vegas will fall to the Legion. That grave of lights, back to dust and ghosts, as was meant.
translation: 没有了NCR的支持，维加斯将会落入军团之手。那座灯火通明的坟墓，又将归于尘土和幽灵，如其所愿。

original: After this, only one flag will remain over the Mojave. Let that one fly, or destroy itself.
translation: 在这之后，莫哈维的上空只会有一面旗帜。要么飘扬，要么自我毁灭。

original: You don't see, listen - even when it's all around you, no matter if I nailed it into your head like a gift from Caesar.
translation: 你不看，不听 - 即使它就在你身边，不管我是否把它像凯撒的礼物一样钉进你的头颅。

original: You brought the Divide to life, Courier. You walked the road. Brought the Bear, then the Bull, brought me, following your tracks.
translation: 你给了大裂谷生命，邮差。你走过那条路，带来了熊，然后是公牛；带来了我，跟随着你的足迹。

original: And when I saw the Divide you made, I saw a second chance, a new way of thinking. My world - no longer the East.
translation: 当我看到你造就的大裂谷，我看到了第二次机会，一种新的思考方式。我的世界 - 不再是东部。

original: Then you brought the West in that package. Destroyed it all. Nearly killed me, flesh and spirit.
translation: 然后你从那个包裹中带来了西部。毁灭了这一切，差点杀死我，肉体和精神。

original: You destroyed something larger than the Bear, greater than the Bull. And even when you could have turned away, you brought it again, in that machine.
translation: 你摧毁了比熊更大的东西，比牛更大的东西。甚至当你可以转身离开的时候，你又把它带来了，在那台机器里。

original: You destroyed a nation taking its first breath. A place that could have been my home. Now, I'll destroy yours.
translation: 你摧毁了一个初生的国家。一个本可以成为我的家的地方。现在，我将摧毁你的。

original: This is between you and me, not anyone else.
translation: 这是你我之间的事，与其他人无关。

original: No... the paths we've walked. The roads, and the flags above them, carry equal blame.
translation: 不...我们走过的路，这些道路，和道路上的旗帜都负有同样的责任。

original: So, what - you intend to bomb the Mojave?
translation: 所以，怎么，你打算炸了莫哈维？

original: No, the West. The East. It doesn't matter - the death of either one kills the other, Vegas along with it. The West shall answer first.
translation: 不，西部，东部。这无关紧要 - 任何一方的死亡都会杀死另一方，维加斯也会随之而死。西部将首先付出代价。

original: No, not the Mojave. The West, all that's been built since America died. Same symbols as before the war, now a flag carried by a tribe of children.
translation: 不，不是莫哈维。是西部，美国灭亡后所建立的一切。与战前相同的象征，现在成了一群孩子们挥舞的旗帜。

original: You walked the West, didn't stay. You know the reason... the Bear grows without structure, follows a symbol without knowing its history.
translation: 你走过西部，没有停留。你知道原因...熊在没有结构的情况下生长，追随着一个象征而不知道它的历史。

original: What happened at the Divide, what I did, was an accident. What you're doing - it's madness.
translation: 在大裂谷发生的事，我做的事，都是意外。你现在做的事，太疯狂了。

original: No, now there is purpose. I believe you when you say you were... careless. The Divide... the Chip... the machine you brought here...
translation: 不，现在有了目标。我相信你说你曾经...漫不经心。大裂谷...芯片...你带来的机器...

original: Many messages can be taken from that, intended or not. What I do now is an act of conviction.
translation: 可以从中获取许多信息，不管是否有意。我现在所做的是一种信念。

original: If you blame me for the Divide, then let me answer for it, not others.
translation: 如果你把大裂谷的事怪在我头上，那就让我来负责，而不是其他人。

original: Blame you? No, learned from you. Both the weapon to kill a nation, and the strength to do it.
translation: 怪你？不，是跟你学的。既有杀死一个国家的武器，也有这么做的力量。

original: You showed me a road, a way to carry my message. You've already answered for what you've done. Now the flag you follow will answer for it.
translation: 你给我指明了一条路，一条传递我信息的路。你已经为你的所作所为付出了代价，现在你所追随的旗帜将对此负责。

original: Where is the package now?
translation: 包裹现在在哪里？

original: Buried in the Divide. Part of it now.
translation: 埋在大裂谷里，现在是它的一部分。

original: Wherever it is, it's been silent... if it spoke again, we'd know.
translation: 无论它在哪里，一直很沉默...如果它再次说话，我们就知道了。

original: Why would I have brought it here?
translation: 我为什么要把它带来？

original: I've walked the East. You've walked the West, more than I have.
translation: 我走过了东部。你走过了西部，比我更多。

original: Circle Junction. Reno. Vault City. Word of you at Fort Aradesh... Fort Abandon. Even further West than that, Brahmin drives on the Big Circle.
translation: 圆圈枢纽、里诺、地下掩体市。你在亚拉德什要塞的消息...也就是遗弃要塞。甚至更远的西部，婆罗门沿着大圆圈行驶。

original: Whatever you saw out there, wasn't enough to make you stay. Maybe the markings on the package reminded you of the road home.
translation: 无论你在外面看到了什么，都不足以让你留下。也许包裹上的标记让你想起了回家的路。

original: This package... you said it had markings? What was it?
translation: 那个包裹...你说上面有个标记？什么样的？

original: Machinery. Simple on the outside, computer parts. Inside... more complicated.
translation: 机械。外观简单，电脑零件。内部...更加复杂。

original: Was the only time I'd heard a machine speak in the Divide, the only machine with a voice.
translation: 这是我在大裂谷唯一一次听到机器说话，也是唯一有声音的机器。

original: This is revenge for nearly killing you, then.
translation: 那么，这就是对差点杀了你的报复。

original: Not the name I'd give it. Not the name the dead would give it.
translation: 不是我给它的名字，也不是死者会给它的。

original: Soldiers of the Bear died here... Legion died, too, my brothers. Still dying, both of them, all around us.
translation: 熊的士兵死在这里...军团也死了，我的兄弟们。他们俩仍在死去，就在我们周围。

original: None of the people that lived here survived... yet all of the West and the East, they hold on as the Divide tears at them.
translation: 生活在这里的人无一幸存...然而所有的西部和东部，都在大裂谷的撕扯中坚持着。

original: Revenge isn't the message I have for you. More than that... Courier.
translation: 复仇并不是我给你的信息，不止如此...邮差。

original: So you blame me for this? An accident?
translation: 所以你把这归咎于我？ 一个意外？

original: Blame? Accident? The names you hang on this... Courier... you carry death wherever you go, Mojave knows - or will.
translation: 归咎？意外？你的名字挂在这上面...邮差...你走到哪里都带着死亡，莫哈维知道 - 或者将会知道。

original: I'll see you answer for this. The road doesn't end here, there's more to come, I swear to you.
translation: 我会看到你为这个付出代价的。这条路不会到此为止，还有更多的路要走，我向你发誓。

original: If you saw this happen, then how did you survive?
translation: 如果你目睹了这一切，那你是怎么活下来的？

original: Should've died there... but now that I know you live... the machines here... saved me. I was the only survivor, or thought I was.
translation: 应该死在那里的...但现在我知道你还活着...这里的机器...救了我。我是唯一的幸存者，或者说我认为我是。

original: Your package, the message inside, awoke medical machines... close to the one that shadows you... began to build themselves, then others.
translation: 你的包裹，里面的信息，唤醒了医疗机器...和跟着你的那个很像...它们开始组装自己，然后是其他的。

original: They only take what parts they find in the Divide, never roam beyond it - can't even leave the silos without a human to shadow, like hounds.
translation: 它们仅仅在大裂谷搜集自己所需，从不在大裂谷以外的地方游荡 - 甚至不能在无人跟随的情况下离开发射井，像猎犬一样。

original: Maybe they saw the flag on my jacket, thought I was of America. If so, history saved me. A sign.
translation: 也许它们看到了我夹克上的旗帜，以为我是美国人。如果是这样，历史拯救了我，一个符号拯救了我。

original: This place was important to the Legion?
translation: 这地方对军团很重要？

original: Why did NCR want to keep the route open?
translation: 为什么NCR想要保持这条路线的畅通？

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你是什么意思？

original: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: 大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [NCR] NCR would have needed this supply line open to reinforce the Mojave - and Hoover Dam.
translation: [NCR]NCR需要这条补给线开放来增援莫哈维...和胡佛大坝。

original: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: 大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: [Legion] The Legion would want to cut this road off if it had been a supply line to Hoover Dam.
translation: [军团]如果这条路是胡佛大坝的补给线那军团会想把它切断的。

original: The Dam. That Old World Wall.
translation: 大坝，那面旧世界的墙。

original: The why of it. Hoover Dam.
translation: 它就是原因，胡佛大坝。

original: The Bear, NCR, couldn't be allowed to reach it easily. Long 15... Canaan... both bad enough.
translation: 熊，NCR，不能让它轻易到达。15号公路...迦南...都够糟糕的了。

original: Kimball, Caesar, House... you'd think their whole world was that wall, cutting the Colorado. If I'd never laid eyes on it, never spoke of it...
translation: 金博尔、凯撒、豪斯...你会以为他们的世界就是那堵墙，切断科罗拉多河。如果我从没见过它，从没提起过它...

original: ...but once found, it was all Caesar could see. That, and the flag beyond it, another symbol, big enough to challenge him.
translation: ...而一旦发现了，凯撒眼里就只有它了。那上面还有一面旗帜，另一个象征，大到足以挑战他。

original: And the Divide, one of the roads to it - Legion was tasked with cutting that artery. If you can't kill the Bear in one stroke, bleed it, starve it.
translation: 而大裂谷 - 通往它的道路之一，军团的任务是切断这条动脉。如果你不能一举杀死熊，就给它放血，让它挨饿。

original: That kind of murder... it's what any of the Legion would have done. Now... the Divide belongs to history.
translation: 这种类型的谋杀...是任何一个军团都会的事情。现在...大裂谷属于历史了。

original: Something wrong? You sound... mad... at my robot.
translation: 有什么问题吗？ 你听起来...很生气...对我的机器人。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Hate? No. There's nothing to hate in metal... steel, gold. Or platinum.
translation: [成功] 恨？不。金属没什么可恨的...钢铁、黄金。或者铂金。

original: Your machine... it's just a tool, made of wreckage of the Divide... all that was brought here.
translation: 你的机器...它只是一个工具，由大裂谷的残骸构成...所有被带到这里的东西构成。

original: You have a lot of hate for the robot with me. I can hear it in your voice.
translation: 你对和我在一起的机器人有很多仇恨，我可以从你声音中听出来。

original: [FAILED] When I speak in anger, Courier, you'll know it. Your machine? Worth no more hate than any other machine.
translation: [失败] 当我愤怒的说话时，邮差，你会知道的。你的机器？不比任何其他机器更值得仇恨。

original: So you're saying I walked this road once from another direction - from West to East. To home.
translation: 你是说我从另一个方向...从西到东...走过这条路。回家。

original: I don't understand. What message?
translation: 我不明白。什么信息？

original: The nations of the Mojave. Cracked and broken as the Divide... its people, the same.
translation: 莫哈维的国家。像大裂谷一样裂开和破碎...它的人民，也是如此。

original: I have walked at Caesar's command, across the East, into the West. Far enough to know Caesar's word did not drive me. Far enough to see the end.
translation: 我曾受凯撒之命，穿越东部，前往西部。远到足以知道凯撒的话无法激励我，远到可以看到尽头。

original: You've seen it. No Courier, whatever their flag can ignore it. Why you didn't stay in the West. Why you wandered.
translation: 你已经见到了，没有邮差，无论他们的旗帜是什么都可以忽略。为什么你没有留在西部，为什么你一直在徘徊。

original: There is no future in the Bear or Bull. The Bear is diseased, barely clings to life.
translation: 熊或牛都没有未来。熊已经病入膏肓，勉强苟延残喘。

original: And the Bull... when the Legion reaches the sea, it will turn on itself and die.
translation: 而公牛...当军团到达海边，它会自我毁灭。

original: Killing one will end both. And you made me see how one could do it. Your ignorance, carelessness - can be used with a purpose.
translation: 杀死一个就能终结两者。你让看到了一个人要如何做到这一点，你的无知，漫不经心 - 可以被有目的的利用。

original: If this is why you're angry, you've seen nothing yet.
translation: 如果这就是你生气的原因，你还什么都没看到。

original: So this is revenge, then. For destroying the Divide.
translation: 所以这就是报复，因为摧毁了大裂谷的。

original: And that's why you want me dead.
translation: 这就是为什么你想要我死。

original: My history isn't revenge, or hate. The road that brought us both here - isn't about that.
translation: 我的历史不是复仇，也不是憎恨。这条路指引着我们两个走到这里 - 不是为了这些。

original: It's about the message you carried. The one in that package, whether you knew it or not.
translation: 是关于你带来的那个信息。包裹里的那个，不管你知不知道。

original: The message that one can kill a nation. Can kill a symbol. And all that gather beneath its flag.
translation: 这段信息是关于一个人可以杀死一个国家，可以杀死一个象征，以及聚集在其旗帜下的一切。

original: I don't blame you for the Divide. I blame you for what you made me see.
translation: 我不责怪你造就了大裂谷。我只因为你让我看到的东西而责怪你。

original: Now you will see what you brought to the Mojave, and that will be my message to you.
translation: 现在你将看到你究竟给莫哈维带来了什么，而这将是我给你的信息。

original: All things come to an end. If you put faith in something outside yourself, tough.
translation: 所有的事情都会结束。 如果你把信心放在自己以外的东西上，那就很难了。

original: If you cared about the Divide, then I'm sorry for what happened here.
translation: 如果你真的在乎大裂谷，那我为这里发生的事感到抱歉。

original: So you believed in this place. What it once was.
translation: 所以你相信这个地方，它曾经的样子。

original: There was hope here, another chance. A new nation, stirring to life. A place I could have set my flag.
translation: 这里有希望，有另一个机会。一个新的国家，生命在萌动。一个我可以树立自己旗帜的地方。

original: Not the America of old. But something larger than the tribes of the East, something larger than the houses of the West. Something better.
translation: 不是过去的美国。但是比东方的部落更大，比西方的房子更大。更好的东西。

original: The Divide... could have bridged both, like Hoover Dam. Now like the Dam, it's too covered in blood to see what it could have been.
translation: 大裂谷...本可以成为连接两者的桥梁，就像胡佛大坝那样。现在也像大坝那样，被鲜血覆盖，看不出可能是什么。

original: You gave life to this place. I followed your road here, saw the Divide. You led me here, so that I could see.
translation: 你给了这个地方生命。我沿着你的道路来到这里，看到了大裂谷。你带我来这里，我才能看到。

original: Then, you brought it to an end.
translation: 然后，你终结了这一切。

original: I'm glad this place burned... obviously, it meant something to you, which makes it even better.
translation: 我很高兴这个地方被烧毁了...显然，这对你来说很重要，那就更好了。

original: You think I'm responsible for this. My question is what your tie to this place is.
translation: 你认为我是罪魁祸首。我的问题是你跟这地方有什么关系。

original: If you blame me for what happened here at the Divide - why do you care?
translation: 如果你把大裂谷发生的事都怪在我身上...你为什么在乎？

original: The community that was once here... and the package you brought... both had markings of the Divide. Markings of America.
translation: 这儿曾经的社区...和你带来的包裹...都有着大裂谷的印记，美国的印记。

original: You've seen the marks, the symbol. As early as the Hopeville silo, maybe. Carried it etched on your weapons.
translation: 你见过那些记号，那些象征。也许早在黎明镇的发射井就见过了，把它刻在了你的武器上。

original: The Divide, its buildings, its people, were built around those same markings, surrounded them here...
translation: 大裂谷，它的建筑，它的人民，都是围绕着这些相同的标志而建的，在这里围绕着它们...

original: ...markings like the flag on my back. When I followed your road to the Divide those years ago, I saw the symbol I wore all around me.
translation: ...像我背后的旗帜一样的印记。那些年，当我沿着你的路走向大裂谷时，我在周围看到了我佩戴的象征。

original: An Old World symbol. Strong, to survive here - its people, strong. Outlast the Bear, outlast the Bull. Promise of something better.
translation: 旧世界的象征。坚强，才能在这里生存 - 它的人民，坚强。熬过了熊，熬过了牛。预示着更好的。

original: Caesar was right to want it dead. NCR was right to want to rake their claws in it.
translation: 凯撒想要它死是对的。NCR想把他们的爪子伸向它也是对的。

original: Seeing it... changed me, just as seeing Hoover Dam changed Caesar and the NCR.
translation: 看到它...改变了我，正如看到胡佛大坝改变了凯撒和NCR。

original: Seeing it end changed me, too.
translation: 看到它的终结，也改变了我。

original: [Legion] Killing NCR, cutting off their supply line at the Divide serves Legion, as do we all.
translation: [军团]杀死NCR，切断他们在大裂谷的补给线对军团有好处，对我们也一样。

original: Serves the Legion?
translation: 为军团服务？

original: I carry no hatred for duty... if that's what this was. The Divide was more than that. Its people, more than that.
translation: 我不憎恨责任...如果这就是的话。大裂谷不止于此，它的人民，不止于此。

original: If you're Legion, are you angry because I destroyed the Divide supply line instead of you?
translation: 如果你是军团，你会因为我破坏了大裂谷补给线而生气吗？

original: The supply line - the artery for the West? I have seen the blood of NCR at Legion hands many times.
translation: 补给线 - 西部的动脉？我已经多次见到军团的双手被NCR的鲜血浸染。

original: I carry no hatred for duty... if that's what this was. The Divide was more than that. Its people, more than that.
translation: 我不憎恨责任...如果这就是的话。大裂谷不止于此，它的人民，不止于此。

original: Then what? Did the Divide explosion kill your family? Your wife - children?
translation: 然后呢？大裂谷爆炸杀死了你的家人吗？你的妻子...孩子吗？

original: [Legion] The dead? You mean your brothers in the Legion - our brothers.
translation: [军团]死者？你是说你军团里的兄弟...我们的兄弟。

original: The Legion who died here... they didn't deserve to die, like those that died in the fires of Boulder City... bombs, Hanlon's gifts.
translation: 死在这里的军团...他们不应该死去，就像那些死在巨石城大火中的人一样...炸弹，汉隆的礼物。

original: Their deaths were mercy compared to those who still walk. Any who die beneath the flag of the Bull... their death should be in battle.
translation: 与那些仍在行走的人相比，他们的死亡是仁慈的。任何死在公牛旗帜下的人...他们应该死在战场上。

original: But no... the dead number more than my brothers.
translation: 但是不...死者的数量比我的兄弟要多。

original: [NCR] The dead? You mean the Republic troops who were here?
translation: [NCR]死者？你是说这里的共和国军队？

original: The soldiers of the Bear? They were dead already, their symbol... diseased. Deserved to die as my brothers did at Boulder City, mines, bombs.
translation: 熊的士兵？他们已经死了，他们的象征...病态。就该像我的兄弟们在巨石城那样死去，地雷、炸弹。

original: I carry nothing for them. Their deaths here were a mercy - compared to the ones that still walk the Divide.
translation: 我没有带给他们任何东西。他们死在这里是一种仁慈 - 与那些仍在大裂谷中行走的人相比。

original: When you speak of the dead - you mean the Marked Men? The Legion and NCR?
translation: 你说的死者，是指那些烙印者？军团和NCR？

original: The soldiers of the Bear? They were dead already, their symbol... diseased. Deserved to die as my brothers did at Boulder City, mines, bombs.
translation: 熊的士兵？他们已经死了，他们的象征...病态。就该像我的兄弟们在巨石城那样死去，地雷、炸弹。

original: I carry nothing for them. Their deaths here were a mercy - compared to the ones that still walk the Divide.
translation: 我没有带给他们任何东西。他们死在这里是一种仁慈 - 与那些仍在大裂谷中行走的人相比。

original: As for my brothers in the Legion... they deserved to die in battle, as do all beneath the flag of the Bull.
translation: 至于我军团的兄弟们...战死沙场是他们应得的，就像所有在公牛旗帜下的人一样。

original: But no... the dead number more than my brothers.
translation: 但是不...死者的数量比我的兄弟要多。

original: The Divide explosion... what, did I kill your family? Your wife - children?
translation: 大裂谷爆炸...等等，我杀死了你的家人吗？你的妻子...孩子吗？

original: My family? My tribe lives... its history? Died long ago, fell under the shadow of the Bull... consumed by another symbol.
translation: 我的家人？我的部落生活...它的历史？很久以前就死了，倒在公牛的阴影之下...被另一个象征所吞噬。

original: No, this isn't about family - or any common blood. It's blood shared by acts, not by chance.
translation: 不，这和家庭无关 - 或者说任何血缘。这是有行动而共有的血液，不是偶然的。

original: What happened here was an accident. Any anger you have, let it go.
translation: 这里发生的是一场意外。你有任何的愤怒，都放下吧。

original: So you're angry because I accidentally brought an explosive to the Divide?
translation: 所以你很愤怒，因为我意外地把炸药带到了大裂谷？

original: Accident? Ignorance is a choice. The Chip - a choice.
translation: 意外？无知是一种选择。芯片 - 也是一种。

original: As for anger... it is what I carry for the dead, and all that come here.
translation: 至于愤怒...这是我为死者和所有来到这里的人所背负的。

original: "The why of it?" You're the one who needs to answer that - why are you doing this?
translation: “为什么呢？”你才是那个需要回答这个问题的人...你为什么要这么做？

original: Want to hear the answer of it. Not just history's answer... your answer for what happened here.
translation: 我想听听你的答案，不仅仅是历史的答案...你对这里发生的事的答案。

original: [Legion] I'll see that you answer for it.
translation: [军团]我会看到你的回答的。

original: Then Legion kills Legion. Farther you walk from the flag of the Bull, the more West creeps into you.
translation: 然后军团杀死了军团。你离公牛的旗帜越远，西部就越深入你的心。

original: [Legion] I didn't side with the Legion until the Mojave.
translation: [军团]直到莫哈维我才站在军团一边。

original: I know that now. Doesn't change what was done. The Legion who died here.
translation: 我现在知道了。但这并不改变已经发生的事，这里死去的军团。

original: Legion doesn't know your history. I do. They find out what happened here, how many of their own died... they'll want an answer.
translation: 军团不了解你的过往，我了解。他们发现了这里发生的事情，死了多少自己人...他们需要一个答案。

original: What's so important about him?
translation: 他有什么重要的？

original: What's inside that machine - that's all that mattered. All the machines here, made of wreckage from the Divide... and all that was brought here.
translation: 这台机器里面的东西 - 才是最重要的。这里所有的机器都是由大裂谷的残骸制成的...以及所有被带到这里的东西。

original: Inside its frame, it carries the message you brought here... and it'll do what it was programmed to do: whatever it can to get home.
translation: 在它的框架里，承载着你带来的信息...它会按照设定的程序去执行：尽一切可能回家。

original: The giants here will listen to it. I'll bring the Divide to your home, your nation. Let its flag burn, just like you let the Divide burn.
translation: 这里的巨人会听到。我将把大裂谷带到你的家，你的国家。让它的旗帜燃烧，就像你让大裂谷燃烧一样。

original: Big Mountain access code... Ulysses. Command override...
translation: 大山脉访问码...尤利西斯。指令超驰...

original: Navarro.
translation: 纳瓦罗。

original: You want the robot? Why?
translation: 你想要机器人？为什么？

original: It's a messenger. Like us... and it shares our history.
translation: 它是一个信使。像我们一样...它分享我们的历史。

original: If you feel its loss... remember you could have turned away at any time. Gone back home, and none of this would have happened.
translation: 如果你感觉到它的迷失...记住你可以在任何时候转身离开，回到家，这一切就不会发生了。

original: But you had to make one last delivery, and that's why I knew you'd come, Courier. Couldn't stay away, it's who you are.
translation: 但你必须做最后一次送货，这就是为什么我知道你会来，邮差。你无法置身事外，这就是你。

original: Maybe there's something similar to be said about that Old World flag on your back.
translation: 也许你背上的旧世界国旗也有类似的含义。

original: No, what it means is that what pieces survive can become worse than they were before.
translation: 不，这意味着幸存下来的东西可能会变得比以前更糟。

original: It's proof that killing a symbol is going to be harder than you thought.
translation: 这证明杀死一个象征比你想象中要难。

original: Back to symbols and history, then. Hard to kill... like Couriers.
translation: 那就回到象征和历史上来吧。很难杀死...就像邮差。

original: You're saying when the meaning gets lost - that what happens here, can make things worse. Happened in the Mojave. Flags of the Bear and Bull.
translation: 你说的是当失去意义时 - 这里发生的事，会让事情变得更糟。在莫哈维发生过，熊和牛的旗帜。

original: So you carry two symbols then - the mark of America and the Twisted Hairs, neither dead.
translation: 所以你身上有两个象征 - 美国的标志和卷发部落，都没有死。

original: Both... both survived, pieces of them. Remnants, nothing more.
translation: 两个...两个都活了下来，它们的碎片。残迹，仅此而已。

original: But the Twisted Hairs survived, even after Caesar.
translation: 但是卷发部落幸存了下来，甚至在凯撒之后。

original: No, they didn't. They were ended, completely. Became part of history's march.
translation: 不，他们没有。他们结束了，彻底。成为了历史前进的一部分。

original: If you feel there is meaning in the White Legs taking the braids of my tribe... what they did... insult, not respect.
translation: 如果你觉得白腿部落拿走我族人的辫子有任何意义的话...他们的做法...是侮辱，不是尊重。

original: In the death of that history, another was born, and you grew to respect the White Legs.
translation: 在那段历史的消亡中，另一段历史诞生了，你逐渐尊重白腿部落。

original: Respect the White Legs? That tribe of jackals? Never.
translation: 尊重白腿？那帮豺狼？从来没有。

original: In the log, you said they were shadows, in the way they wore their hair.
translation: 在日志里，你说他们是影子，从他们的发型来看。

original: The braids I wore. They took that from me, thought it made them more like me, more willing to have Caesar listen.
translation: 我蓄的辫子。他们从我这拿走了，以为这会让他们更像我，更能让凯撒听从。

original: They didn't know what the braids meant, the mark of my tribe before Caesar came... before Vulpes came for them at Dry Wells.
translation: 他们不知道这些辫子意味着什么，在凯撒来之前我部落的标志...在沃尔普斯到枯井找到他们之前。

original: There was death in that meeting, even while Vulpes smiled - asked for our help against the other tribes.
translation: 那次会面中包含着死亡，即使是当在沃尔普斯微笑的时候 - 他请我们帮助对抗其他部落。

original: All the while, they were looking to cast our history on the fire. And did. Another tribe, consumed by the Bull - nothing left.
translation: 自始至终，他们一直都在寻求将我们的历史付之一炬，并且做到了。又一个部落，被公牛吞噬 - 什么都没留下。

original: You're wrong, and you led them to destroy your tribe at New Canaan.
translation: 你错了，是你引导他们摧毁了你在新迦南的部落。

original: I'm talking about the past, in the respect they showed you.
translation: 我说的是过去，从他们对你的尊重来看。

original: Respect...?
The White Legs might as well have been your people.
translation: 那些白腿部落也可能是你的人民。

original: The White Legs? To even claim they were shadows of the Twisted Hairs...
translation: 白腿？甚至可以声称他们是卷发部落的影子...

original: No, whatever words you heard, they were not mine.
translation: 不，不管你听到什么，都不是我的。

original: But your tribe was New Canaan.
translation: 但你的部落是新迦南。

original: New Canaan? My tribe?
translation: 新迦南？我的部落？

original: Any symbol deserves a chance to defend itself, by words or acts - not... this.
translation: 任何象征都应该有机会通过言语或行为来捍卫自己...而不是...这样。

original: As you defend it now?
translation: 正如你现在捍卫的那样？

original: It hasn't proven itself wrong. That's why the Legion and NCR conflict must continue. To test it.
translation: 它还没有证明自己是错的，这就是军团和NCR冲突必须继续下去的原因。来测试它。

original: Test it. As you test me? As if you believe there is some other road here.
translation: 测试它。就像你测试我一样？好像你相信这里还有其他道路似的。

original: Nothing can prevent what comes. The missiles will launch. These questions - your words, or mine - what do they matter to you.
translation: 没有什么能阻止即将到来的事了，导弹将会发射。这些问题- 你的话，或者我的话 -它们对你有什么重要的？

original: By your standards? Or history's?
translation: 按你的标准？还是历史的？

original: Both. Why do you care.
translation: 两者都有。你为什么关心这些？

original: You said in the logs yourself that technology's a dead road. These missiles will solve nothing.
translation: 你自己在日志里说过科技是一条死路，这些导弹解决不了任何问题。

original: Those are my words. After what happened with the Brotherhood... talking with them.
translation: 那是我说的话。在和钢铁兄弟会发生的事之后...和他们谈了谈。

original: Then with the rulers of the Big Empty. But it is their philosophy that was flawed - their weapons, used with new perspective...
translation: 然后是大空洞的统治者们。 但他们的哲学是有缺陷的 - 他们的武器，用新的视角来使用...

original: Those weapons can be used to kill a symbol that has already proven itself wrong.
translation: 那些武器可以用来杀死一个已经被证明是错误的象征。

original: If you believe the destruction of the Divide was just, then I cannot stop you.
translation: 如果你认为摧毁大裂谷是正义的，那我无法阻止你。

original: Just? There was no justice in it, it was an act of carelessness, a coward. Killing an idea, before it had a chance...
translation: 正义？这里面没有正义可言，这是一个粗心大意的行为，一个懦夫。扼杀一个想法，在它有机会之前...

original: I see your meaning. You're tying this to our history... but it is different. The symbol I destroy, it has already proven itself wrong.
translation: 我明白你的意思了。你把这与我们的历史联系起来...但这是不同的。我摧毁的那个象征，已经证明了自己是错误的。

original: Do you really think these missiles can kill everyone?
translation: 你真的认为这些导弹能杀死所有人吗？

original: Kill them - no. The symbol they follow? Yes, as surely as you did at the Divide.
translation: 杀了他们 - 不。他们追随的象征？是的，就像你在大裂谷所做的一样。

original: The question reminded the ones you spoke to of their purpose, why they cared.
translation: 这个问题提醒了那些与你交谈的人他们的目的，他们为什么关心。

original: I spoke those words in anger, and I did not expect an answer. All was lost... I thought it was the end.
translation: 我是在愤怒中说出这些话的，我并不期望得到回答。一切都完了... 我以为这就是结局。

original: Past their graves of failed technology, they had cared about the flag they had followed... and the people beneath it. Even with them dead and gone.
translation: 过去失败科技的坟墓，他们关心的是他们追随的旗帜...以及那旗帜下的人。即使他们已经死去。

original: But there's no answer in that. I do this because I care, because I believe it must be done.
translation: 但这里没有答案。我这样做是因为我在乎，因为我相信必须这样做。

original: You were trapped, needed to escape, and needed the distraction. It was the key.
translation: 你被困住了，需要逃跑，需要转移注意力。这是钥匙。

original: I never sought to escape. I went to them to get an answer or die.
translation: 我从未试图逃跑。我找他们是为了得到答案或者死亡。

original: It was all you could say to prevent from being killed. That's what I'm hoping for here.
translation: 为了不被杀，你只能这么说。这就是我现在希望的。

original: When I asked that question, death was certain. I wasn't begging for mercy.
translation: 当我问这个问题的时候，死亡就是必然的。我不是在乞求宽恕。

original: When all seemed lost, you asked it even though you feared the answer.
translation: 当一切似乎都失去的时候，你问了，尽管你害怕答案。

original: Fear? No. Anger.
translation: 害怕？不，愤怒。

original: If you've heard my words and that's all you've taken from them, then I was right to cast them aside.
translation: 如果你听了我的话并且这就是你所得到的全部，那么我把他们扔到一边是对的。

original: If you ever had any ability to hear anything beyond your own footsteps... the Divide silenced it. Now, its voice will end you.
translation: 如果你曾经有能力听到自己脚步之外的任何声音...大裂谷使它沉默了。现在，它的声音将终结你。

original: In the logs of the White Legs, you mentioned your tribe, and its past.
translation: 在白腿部落的那段日志里，你提到了你的部落，和它的过去。

original: My tribe? That log... no, it concerned the White Legs, training them to kill. For Caesar.
translation: 我的部落？那个日志...不，那是关于白腿部落的，训练他们去杀戮。为了凯撒。

original: There is no meaning there beyond the road to New Canaan. The history of the murder of its people. And Caesar's past.
translation: 除了通往新迦南的路那里没有任何意义。还有屠杀人民的历史，以及凯撒的过去。

original: "Who are you, who do not know your history?"
translation: "你是谁，不知道你自己的历史吗？"

original: That question... either you walked the Big Empty... you found the last of the holotapes.
translation: 那个问题...要么你去过大空洞...你找到了最后的全息磁带。

original: The words are mine. Whatever... "answer" you think they hold, you're wrong. It was a question, nothing more.
translation: 这些话是我说的...无论如何...你认为他们有“答案”，那你就错了。这只是个问题，仅此而已。

original: I'll let your words answer it, from the tapes you left along the road to the Divide.
translation: 我会用你的话来回答这个问题，从你在通往大裂谷的路上留下的录音带里。

original: My words? And what do my words teach you.
translation: 我的话？我的话又能教你什么。

original: I still don't understand - why are you doing this?
translation: 我还是不明白，你为什么要这么做？

original: You've answered your own question. And you'll die with that question on your lips.
translation: 你已经回答了自己的问题。你会带着这个问题死去的。

original: I believe destroying the symbol is never the answer. Changing it - that's something else.
translation: 我相信摧毁象征永远不是解决问题的办法。改变它...那是另一回事。

original: It may be... that as much destruction has been written in the earth here...
translation: 也许吧...这里的土地上已经写下了如此多的毁灭。

original: One buried this place, yet it lived on between us. One may build it again - build others. Your history has proven this, here.
translation: 某个人埋葬了这个地方，但它却存在于我们之间。某个人可能会重建它 - 建造其他的。你的历史已经证明了这一点，在这里。

original: There is truth in your words. But even if there is hope in change... it may not matter. The Divide still stands against us.
translation: 你的话有一定道理。但即使有改变的希望...可能也并不重要。大裂谷仍然站在我们的对立面。

original: If you meant to kill me, you should have done it long ago.
translation: 如果你想杀我，早就该动手了。

original: I believed in what I followed then. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
translation: 我相信我当时所遵循的。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。

original: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. Now, our allegiances are reversed.
translation: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。现在，我们的立场颠倒了。

original: [Legion] Being Frumentarii kept you from killing me in the past. You have no such defense now.
translation: [军团]作为一个军团特务，你过去没有杀我。你现在没有这种防备了。

original: Not if you believe in what you follow. Kill no Courier, Caesar's words. I honored them.
translation: 只要你相信你所追随的就不会。不要杀邮差，这是凯撒的话。我尊重这些。

original: Other Couriers could have been Legion - like me. The truth is, you serve nothing, believe nothing. Killing you... meaningless.
translation: 其他的邮差可能是军团的人 - 比如我。但事实是，不为任何人服务，什么都不相信。杀了你...没有意义。

original: I want you to die knowing you're wrong, and that's what history will remember.
translation: 我希望你死的时候知道自己错了，这才是历史会记住的。

original: We fight over how we will be remembered, then.
translation: 那么，我们为如何被记住而战。

original: No danger there. You skipped past where you build the community, moved onto killing one.
translation: 那里没有危险。你跳过了创建社区的阶段，转而去杀死一个社区。

original: Nothing can prevent what comes. The missiles will launch. These questions - your words, or mine - what do they matter to you.
translation: 没有什么能阻止即将到来的事了，导弹将会发射。这些问题- 你的话，或者我的话 -它们对你有什么重要的？

original: Don't even suggest we're equals. You couldn't have done this without me bringing you what you need.
translation: 别暗示我们是平等的。如果没有我给你带来你需要的东西，你不可能做到的。

original: You were tricked. Still, you take pride in it.
translation: 你被骗了。不过，你还是以此为荣。

original: Then stop this, you can't truly believe what you're doing.
translation: 那就停下，你不可能真正相信你所做的事情。

original: Look, just the fact we're talking should mean you don't want to do this.
translation: 听着，我们在谈这件事说明你不想这么做。

original: No. You are wrong. Words will not bridge this.
translation: 不，你错了。言语无法弥合这一点。

original: The Divide survived in you. If it felt like something fighting for, you can rebuild it.
translation: 大裂谷在你心中。如果你觉得需要为之奋斗，你可以重建它。

original: Nothing can prevent what comes. The missiles will launch. These questions - your words, or mine - what do they matter to you.
translation: 没有什么能阻止即将到来的事了，导弹将会发射。这些问题- 你的话，或者我的话 -它们对你有什么重要的？

original: All you are is some echo of me, following my road, letting my history dictate yours.
translation: 你只是我的回声，走我的路，让我的历史决定你的。

original: Moral ground? What I did by accident, you're doing with purpose.
translation: 道德基础？我无意中做的事，而你是有目的的。

original: You're planning to kill a nation from a distance, just like NCR - just like you accused me of.
translation: 你打算从远处毁灭一个国家，就像NCR...就像你指控我做的那样。

original: What do I care for your perspective. You walk blindly, foolishly into death, your own and others.
translation: 我不在乎你的看法。你盲目、愚蠢地走向死亡，你自己和其他人的。

original: You do not rule my actions, and do not mistake my acts for yours.
translation: 你不能支配我的行为，也不要把我的行为误认为你的。

original: If one Courier built a community, seems to me you can do the same.
translation: 如果一个邮差能建立一个社区，在我看来你也可以这样做。

original: You said a home is a place you breathe life into, a moment where you know who you are.
translation: 你说家是一个能让你感受到生命的地方，一个让你知道自己是谁的地方。

original: There is truth in that. History has proven it.
translation: 这是有道理的。历史已经证明了这一点。

original: But Mojave's proof that no homeland is sacred... until the larger symbols are destroyed.
translation: 但莫哈维证明了没有一个家园是神圣的...直到更大的象征毁灭。

original: Whatever is built, the Bear, Bull... even Vegas... will tear it apart, convert it, either with purpose, or by accident.
translation: 无论建造什么，熊、公牛...甚至维加斯...会撕裂它，改变它，不管是有意的，还是无意的。

original: "You can go home again, Courier." Not a message for me, for you.
translation: "你可以再次回家了，邮差。"  不是给我的信息，是给你的。

original: My home in the East, Dry Wells, is no more. It is part of the Legion.
translation: 我在东部的家，枯井，已经不在了。它是军团的一部分。

original: The only other home... the chance of a home... was what you built at the Divide. Then you destroyed it.
translation: 唯一的另一个家...一个家的机会...是你在大裂谷建造的。然后你毁了它。

original: Nothing more to say, I've already won. Everything you hate about me, you've become.
translation: 没什么好说的了，我已经赢了。你憎恨我的一切，都变成了你。

original: If you seek to anger me, words won't be enough. Your moral ground is weak here in the Divide.
translation: 如果你想激怒我，言语是不够的。你在大裂谷的道德基础很薄弱。

original: I don't have anything beyond words to change your mind. If you won't listen, it's over.
translation: 除了言语，我没有什么可以改变你的想法。如果你不听，那就结束吧。

original: I don't think that's what's important here.
translation: 我不认为这是最重要的。

original: [SUCCEEDED] Our history... the Divide. That history has been written, its lessons learned.
translation: [成功]我们的历史...大裂谷。历史已被书写，教训已被汲取。

original: There is nothing more to be dug from these cracks in the earth, no more fury to be torn from its sky.
translation: 大地的裂缝中再也挖不出什么东西，天空中再也撕扯不出更多怒火。

original: I'm not talking about NCR or the Legion, I'm talking about our history.
translation: 我并不是在谈论NCR或军团，我说的是我们的历史。

original: [FAILED] If those are your last words, they are weak ones. Actions would have had more voice.
translation: [失败]如果这是你的遗言，那也太软弱了。行动会发出更多的声音。

original: There is nothing more to be said between us. No words of yours will change what is about to happen.
translation: 我们之间没什么好说的了。无论你说什么都改变不了即将发生的事。

original: The symbol you wear is dead, and you helped kill it. The question is - what will you do to fix it?
translation: 你所佩戴的象征已经死亡，而你帮助杀死了它。 问题是...你会做什么来修复它？

original: I believe the missiles can't be stopped. If you believe me, though, we might get through this.
translation: 我相信导弹是无法停止的。 不过，如果你相信我，我们或许能度过这一关。

original: If we must survive to carry its message... then that is what shall be done. I will not let America die here.
translation: 如果我们必须活着去传递它的信息...那这就是应该做的。我不会让美国死在这里。

original: But... it may not matter. Even if we lay down our weapons, the Divide... it still stands against us.
translation: 但是...这可能不重要。即使我们放下武器，大裂谷...仍在与我们对抗。

original: You interrupted its journey West, trapped it. If any part of America survived, it's cut off now.
translation: 你打断了它的西行，困住了它。如果美国有任何地区幸存下来，现在也被隔绝了。

original: The package I brought was from Navarro, the Divide scanned ED-E's logs from the Mojave.
translation: 我带来的包裹来自纳瓦罗，大裂谷扫描了ED-E在莫哈维的日志。

original: What do you seek to gain by telling me this. If you think that the symbol I wear is a weakness...
translation: 你告诉我这些是想寻求什么？如果你认为我佩戴的象征是一种弱点...

original: The Eyebot was a courier, sent to the West, to make contact with the remnants of America.
translation: 眼球机器人是一名邮差，被派往西部，与美国的残余势力取得联系。

original: Its logs tell of a place where America survived... may still exist. And it's falling apart.
translation: 这个日志讲述了一个美国幸存下来的地方...可能仍然存在。而它正在分崩离析。

original: You lie. There was only one message in the machine, only one message in the package you brought.
translation: 你撒谎。机器里只有一条信息，你带来的包裹里只有一条信息。

original: The Divide bore the symbol of America... as did the package from Navarro. The origins of the machine is... of no importance.
translation: 大裂谷承载着美利坚的象征...纳瓦罗寄来的包裹也是。这台机器的来源...并不重要。

original: It has history inside it. The logs of what's left of "America."
translation: 里面有历史，记录仅存的"美国 "的日志。

original: There is nothing inside the machine except the means to awaken the missiles in the Divide. That is its only message.
translation: 那台机器里除了唤醒大裂谷导弹的方法之外什么都没有。那是它唯一的信息。

original: If my words won't change your mind, what about the messages in the Eyebot?
translation: 如果我的话无法改变你的想法，那眼球机器人里的信息呢？

original: The machine made from the parts of Navarro? It had only one message in its core - to get home, at any cost.
translation: 用纳瓦罗的零件制造的机器？它的核心里只有一条讯息 - 回家，不计一切代价。

original: It echoes its master... and soon the missiles here will as well.
translation: 它在回应它的主人...很快这里的导弹也会如此。

original: At least I don't hide behind a machine like a coward.
translation: 至少我不会像个懦夫一样躲在机器后面。

original: Machines... bombs, things of NCR, are your tools, not mine. When we meet, this machine won't keep me from you.
translation: 机器...炸弹，NCR的东西，是你的工具，不是我的。当我们见面时,这个机器不会拦在我们之间。

original: Keep talking like that, I'll see you dead.
translation: 再这样说，我就看你怎么死。

original: You already tried once, won't give you another chance.
translation: 你已经试过一次了，不会再给你第二次机会。

original: Sounds like the idea of a woman in the Legion surprises you.
translation: 听起来军团里有个女人让你很惊讶。

original: You said "brothers" before. So - you're Legion, too.
translation: 你之前说过"兄弟们"。所以...你也是军团的。

original: You mentioned "casting off my disguise?" What do you mean?
translation: 你刚才说"卸下我的伪装？" 是什么意思？

original: I'm no traitor, and when I walk, I don't hide my presence.
translation: 我不是叛徒，当我行走的时候，我从不隐藏自己的存在。

original: Legion wears many colors, East and West. You... maybe blinded by Vegas's light, or the promise of that Chip.
translation: 军团穿着许多颜色，从东部到西部。你...也许是被维加斯的光芒蒙蔽了双眼，或者是被筹码的承诺所蒙蔽。

original: Or maybe you walked so far West, the Bear's sickness crept into you. We'll see. Your offenses before Caesar, the least of the crimes here.
translation: 或者可能你向西走得太远，熊的病悄悄侵入了你的身体。我们拭目以待。你在凯撒面前犯下的罪，在这里是微不足道的。

original: [Legion] You said you'd sworn not to kill me. If you're Legion, why are we at odds?
translation: [军团]你说你曾发誓不会杀我。如果你是军团，为什么我们会有矛盾？

original: You struck first. Not just at me... at the Legion. Or so I thought. Not sure of the history of it now.
translation: 你先出手的。不只是对我...对军团。或者是我这么认为的。现在还不确定这段历史。

original: Whatever flag you follow, or followed then... either way, you got too much of the Bear's sickness in you to live. Divide's proof of that.
translation: 无论你追随什么旗帜，或者当时追随的什么...不管哪种，你身上有太多熊的疾病，无法生存。大裂谷就是证明。

original: Want more than that, walk the road. Answers'll come, closer you get to home... you and that machine.
translation: 想要更多，那就上路吧。答案会来的，当你离家越近...你和那台机器。

original: [Legion] Legion doesn't kill Legion. Caesar's orders?
translation: [军团]军团不杀军团，凯撒的命令？

original: What kind of world would this be if Courier killed Courier.
translation: 如果邮差杀了邮差，这将是一个怎样的世界。

original: You've got enough distance ahead of you - save your breath for the road, don't waste it on words.
translation: 你前面还有很长的路 - 把你的呼吸留给道路吧，不要浪费在言语上。

original: [Legion] Legion does not kill Legion - but you're not that anymore. I'm going to kill you.
translation: [军团]军团不杀军团...但是你已经不属于他们了。我会干掉你的。

original: If that's all that drives you, it won't last. The Legion... it won't last either.
translation: 如果这就是你的全部动力，它不会持续太久。军团...也不会持久。

original: [Legion] So... when you called me traitor in Hopeville, that title belongs to you.
translation: [军团]所以...当你在黎明镇叫我叛徒的时候，那个头衔是属于你的。

original: No, it is a title you earned. Legion or not, you have betrayed more than you know.
translation: 不，这是你赢得的头衔。不管你是不是军团，你的背叛比你自己想象的要多。

original: [Legion] Seeing this place. It meant more to you than the Legion?
translation: [军团]看看这个地方，对你来说比军团更重要吗？

original: Yes. And it did to you once, I'm sure of it.
translation: 是的。对你来说曾经也是，我确信这一点。

original: [Legion] Are you angry that this explosion undermined the Legion's plans? It was an accident.
translation: [军团]你因为这次爆炸破坏了军团的计划而生气吗？那是个意外。

original: Accident? Ignorance is a choice. The Chip - a choice.
translation: 意外？无知是一种选择。芯片 - 也是一种。

original: As for anger... it is what I carry for the dead, and all that come here.
translation: 至于愤怒...这是我为死者和所有来到这里的人所背负的。

original: [Legion] If I destroyed the NCR in this place, why do you care?
translation: [军团]如果我在这个地方摧毁了NCR，你还在乎什么？

original: Legion died here as well. What you did... that's not all that cuts at me.
translation: 军团也死在这。你所做的...并不是我身上所有的伤口。

original: Is this how it must end between us? You followed the East once, you can do so again.
translation: 我们之间必须这样结束吗？ 你曾经追随过东方，你可以再来一次。

original: I cannot go back. I wandered too far, far enough to know my home was lost to me.
translation: 我回不去了。我游荡得太远了，远到足以让我知道我已经失去了家。

original: I could no more go back than you could return to the West. To NCR, and all its sickness.
translation: 我再也回不去了，就像你再也回不去西部一样。回NCR，和它所有的病症。

original: I don't care what happens to NCR, but I can't allow you to harm the Legion.
translation: 我不在乎NCR会怎么样，但我不能允许你伤害军团。

original: Not all the East will burn. The Legion does not need to be destroyed, only... contained within new borders.
translation: 不是所有的东部都会被烧毁。军团不必被摧毁，只需要...被控制在新的边界内。

original: After that, it will fall as any culture bred on war, on forward momentum. It will falter, collapse.
translation: 在那之后，它会像任何在战争中孕育的文明一样，在前进的势头中衰落。它会衰落，崩溃。

original: I will start with their camp at Dry Wells... once my homeland. Justice of a sort.
translation: 我会从他们在枯井的营地开始...我曾经的家乡。勉强称得上正义吧。

original: The Legion doesn't abide traitors. What made you turn from the East?
translation: 军团不容忍叛徒，是什么让你从东方转向？

original: Even after the road you've walked, you only see a traitor before you.
translation: 即使你走过了这条路，你也只能看到一个叛徒在你前面。

original: I know one person can break a nation. Legion tests nations, strengthens them - let it do so.
translation: 我知道一个人就能摧毁一个国家。军团考验国家，使他们强大...就让它这样吧。

original: I'm heading back to the Mojave to settle some things.
translation: 我要回莫哈韦去处理一些事情。

original: Can hear the weight in your feet - you’re bound for that Old World wall. Hoover Dam. Maybe not now - in time.
translation: 我能听到你脚下的重量 - 你要前往那堵旧世界的墙，胡佛大坝。或许不是现在 - 迟早。

original: I'm heading back to the Mojave to settle some things.
translation: 我要回莫哈韦去处理一些事情。
